dct_title_s: An accurate map of North Wales : divided into its counties ; viz. Carnarvonshire, Flintshire, Denbeighshire, Merionythshire, Montgomeryshire with the Isle of Anglesey : improved from the best surveys & intelligences and illustrated with historical extracts relative to its air, soil, natural produce, trade, manufactures &c.
dct_description_sm: Show boundaries, rivers, roads and settlements. Decorative title cartouche. Relief shown by hachures and shading. London meridian. From: The large English atlas: or, A new set of maps of all the counties in England and Wales ... / by Emanuel Bowen, geographer to His Majesty, Thomas Kitchen [sic], and others. London : Printed and sold by Robert Sayer, map and printseller, at no. 53, in Fleet-street, [1760]
dct_publisher_sm: [London] : Printed for T. Bowles ..., John Tinney, & Robt. Sayer ..., & John Bowles & Son ..., [1760]
